description: Introducing the Gucci Loafer Model B, a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate both style and comfort. Crafted from luxurious suede, these loafers exude elegance and class. The rich brown color adds a touch of refinement to any ensemble. Available in US size 10, these loafers offer a relaxed and cozy fit. Elevate your footwear collection with this timeless piece from the prestigious Gucci Boutique.
